[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Thrust: 1[/color][/font]
Press Unknown control sequence: "jetpack" to activate.
Enables you to fly over structures and water. Multiple jetpacks let you fly faster. Flying consumes fuel from your inventory. Rocket fuel gives the best results, but can also burn Nuclear fuel, Solid fuel, Processed fuel (from AAI Industry), and some other modded fuels.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Thrust: 2[/color][/font]
Press Unknown control sequence: "jetpack" to activate.
Enables you to fly over structures and water. Multiple jetpacks let you fly faster. Flying consumes fuel from your inventory. Rocket fuel gives the best results, but can also burn Nuclear fuel, Solid fuel, Processed fuel (from AAI Industry), and some other modded fuels.

Equip this on any train in your fleet to enable shuttle functionality. This is what you want to use for normal shuttle trains.
Equip this on any train in your fleet to enable shuttle control functionality. The train will not respond to shuttle train calls. Use this for special purpose trains.

Somewhat increases max speed and acceleration of the vehicle it is placed in (exception: locomotives only have their acceleration increased).
Greatly increases max speed and acceleration of the vehicle it is placed in (exception: locomotives only have their acceleration increased).
You sent a potato into space as a joke, but it has evolved into an unprecedented form of life and came back. Periodically, you hear the potato singing, but you cannot understand a word.
Receives energy from a [item=kr-tesla-coil] Tesla Coil and recharges other equipment in the grid.

Greatly accelerates the growth of plants in a greenhouse.

Seriously? You've come all this way for this!? You spent long hours constructing a base, researching new technologies, fighting monsters, and for what? To launch THIS into space? Oh, I have no words...
A general-purpose mechanical core for creating automatic machines.
Advanced alloy of rare metals fused with imersite. This alloy is able to withstand colossal temperatures and has unparalleled strength.
A sentient machine enabling an entirely new class of automation.
This filter is twice as effective as the normal one.
Basic components for any inserter. ([color=orange]You can take apart any inserter in the crusher[/color]).
Communicates with a [item=kr-planetary-teleporter] Planetary teleporter to facilitate its function.
Connects a planetary teleporter with an orbiting [item=gps-satellite] GPS satellite.

A rocket control capsule big enough for a passenger. Can be placed into a Cargo rocket silo to complete a Cargo rocket. Can be placed on the ground to take a passenger to an adjacent surface or emergency burn back to the homeworld. Enter the capsule using Unknown control sequence: "toggle-driving".
A damaged version of the Space capsule. Requires refurbishment or scrapping.
The key cargo rocket component. Insert into the cargo rocket silo. 100 are required per rocket. Can be recovered from rocket landings (20% base recoverability).
Cargo rocket sections packed for transit. Must be unpacked to be used in rocket construction.
A cargo rocket section component.
A cargo rocket section component.

75% the energy efficiency of a steam turbine but 99% of the steam used is returned as water. Temperature range: 100 to 999.
[img=tooltip-category-steam][font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Consumes Steam[/color][/font]
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Max consumption:[/color][/font] 111.111/s
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Operation temperature range: [/color][/font]165째C - 900째C

Power output: Variable[/color][/font]
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Steam temperature 165째C:[/color][/font] 3.75MW
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Steam temperature 415째C:[/color][/font] 10MW
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Steam temperature 418째C:[/color][/font] 10MW
Higher temperatures decrease Steam consumption instead of increasing power.
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Efficiency:[/color][/font] 75%
[img=tooltip-category-generates][font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Outputs fluids[/color][/font]
[font=default-semibold][color=#e4cead]Max Water output:[/color][/font] 110/s
[font=default-bold][color=red][img=utility/danger_icon] Requires electricity demand & space to output fluids to function.[/color][/font]
A composite panel used for high-temperature applications and space structures.
A multipurpose containment vessel.
The densest form of energy in a safe to move container.
A superconductive composite cable that does not require active cooling.
Logged satellite telemetry needed for Rocket Science. Gained by launching a [img=item/satellite] Navigation Satellite from a satellite rocket silo (or Space probe rocket silo).
Naquium and nanoengineering.
Hyperlattice structures, singularities and annihilation.
Micro space distortion and extradimensional nanoengineering.
Macro space distortion and extradimensional travel.
Made in a Nexus in a moving spaceship. Moving in interstellar space with a larger faster ship generates data much faster.
Collects data from a star and returns [img=item/se-star-probe-data] Star probe data. Must be launched from a space probe rocket silo that is in close orbit of a star.
Collects data from an asteroid belt and returns [img=item/se-belt-probe-data] Asteroid belt probe data. Must be launched from a space probe rocket silo that is in an asteroid belt.
Collects data from the void and returns [img=item/se-void-probe-data] Interstellar void probe data. Must be launched from a space probe rocket silo that is in an asteroid field.

Defends an area from meteors. Can store enough charge to shoot up to 4 meteors. Must be loaded with meteor point defence ammo and have enough charge to fire. Has a range of 64 and 50% accuracy. Has two charging modes, which can be toggled by pressing Unknown control sequence: "se-mode-toggle".

[font=default-bold][color=red]Normal[/color][color=#FFE7BD]/[/color][color=orange]Quick[/color][/font] [font=default-semibold][color=#FFE7BD]charge modes[/color][/font]
[font=default-semibold][color=#FFE7BD]Max. consumption:[/color][/font] 2 MW / 10 GW
[font=default-semibold][color=#FFE7BD]Min. consumption:[/color][/font] 500 kW / 250 kW
[font=default-semibold][color=#FFE7BD]Energy capacity:[/color][/font] 200 MJ / 800 MJ
[font=default-semibold][color=#FFE7BD]Energy efficiency:[/color][/font] 100% / 25%

Can defend an entire planet and its orbit from meteors but can only shoot 1 meteor a time. Must be loaded with meteor defence ammo and fully charged to fire. 80% accuracy. Needs to recharge after firing. Draws 20MW when recharging.

Beryllium ore.
Holmium ore.
Iridium ore.
Naquium ore. Only found in deep space, a treasure of the interstellar void.
Made by inserting 100 Cargo rocket sections and 1 Space capsule into a Cargo rocket silo.

Use to move a spaceship between planets, moons, orbits, and asteroid fields. Must be contained within spaceship walls/doors, no gaps or holes. Integrity check highlights problems.
This flooring must be under all parts of a spaceship with spaceship walls on the outer edge. Any gaps in the floor will break containment, those sections may detach.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
A modified assembling machine that can work in space.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Combines, compares, and quantifies different sources of astronomic information.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
An advanced chemical lab that specialises in bio-chemistry. Can also perform more basic chemical and oil processing.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Equipment for intense magnetic field and extremely high voltage applications.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Cleans substances for use in sterile environments, and prepares liquids for use in low-pressure conditions.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
A lab dedicated to genetic sequencing, genetic modification, and genetic printing of cultures.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Analyses and simulates gravitational disturbances.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Grows biological specimens under a range of controlled conditions that are impossible elsewhere. In addition to standard climate controls, everything from micro-gravity vats to high-G centrifuges are available.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Performs a heat exchange on thermofluid, making one hotter and the other colder.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Experiments with lasers. Eye protection must be worn.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
A giant assembling machine, but can craft more complicated recipes. Only works in space (or spaceships).

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Synthesises new materials. A cross between a particle collider and 3d printer.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Provides a range of mechanical processes: Crushing, tearing, shearing, vibration, etc.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Accelerates particles near to the speed of light.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Collides high-speed particles and analyses the results.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Generates a variety of plasmas.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
A relatively safe place to play with radioactive material. Can be used for uranium processing.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Radiates away excess heat from overheated thermofluid.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Radiates away excess heat from overheated thermofluid.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Data manipulation, processing and simulation.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Quantum computing. Improved data manipulation, processing and simulation.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Adaptive neural net on a quantum computing framework. Improved data manipulation, processing and simulation.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
A nano-engineered semi-organic supercomputer that leverages space warping and higher dimensions for increased processing density and energy transport.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
A sophisticated telescope sensitive to multiple wavelengths around the visible spectrum.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
X-rays are blocked by most atmospheres. This powerful telescope is designed for space where atmosphere is not a problem.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Gamma rays don't refract so you can't focus them with lenses. This powerful telescope uses mirrors and special detectors instead.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
A huge telescope that detects microwaves and the cosmic microwave background.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
A huge telescope that detects very weak radio waves from distant sources.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Undertakes processes that involve temperature extremes. Can also perform basic thermal processes, such as smelting and kiln recipes.

10 module slots at 75% transmission efficiency for a maximum module power of 7.5. Transmits the effects of modules to nearby friendly entities within 2 tiles. Multiple beacons affecting the same entity will overload it and prevent it from operating.

10 module slots at 100% transmission efficiency for a maximum module power of 10. Transmits the effects of modules to nearby friendly entities within 2 tiles. Multiple beacons affecting the same entity will overload it and prevent it from operating.

15 module slots at 50% transmission efficiency for a maximum module power of 7.5. Transmits the effects of modules to nearby friendly entities within 14 tiles. Multiple beacons affecting the same entity will overload it and prevent it from operating.

20 module slots at 50% transmission efficiency for a maximum module power of 10. Transmits the effects of modules to nearby friendly entities within 14 tiles. Multiple beacons affecting the same entity will overload it and prevent it from operating.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
Can use advanced science packs.
Radioisotope thermoelectric generator. An portable generator that converts the heat from radioactive decay into electricity. Lasts for decades with no additional fuel required.
Radioisotope thermoelectric generator. An improved portable generator that converts the heat from radioactive decay into electricity. Lasts for decades with no additional fuel required.
Collects arcospheres from the interstellar void. Must be launched from a space probe rocket silo that is in an asteroid field. Arcospheres are more difficult to find as more are collected.
Found in the interstellar void.

A large generator that takes in 5000째C steam, outputs 500째C steam at the other end, and outputs water at the sides. 2% of input energy is unused and contained in the output steam.

Allows the accurate delivery of contained resources via a delivery cannon.
Allows the accurate delivery of special ammunitions via a weapons delivery cannon.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Spaceship[/color][/font]
The central building that generates an inter-surface energy beam. Can be used as a weapon or to transfer power to an energy beam receiver. Requires attached energy beam chamber, and connected energy beam injectors. Beam strength is based on the number of injectors.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Spaceship[/color][/font]
Must be attached to an energy beam chamber and connected to an emitter. Injectors have a fixed power draw, each one increases the energy sent giving more heat to a receiver, or increases the speed and damage of the beam weapon.
Increases lifesupport efficiency by +100% (additive). If installed in a non-spacesuit efficiency bonus is halved and won't work in space.
Increases lifesupport efficiency by +200% (additive). If installed in a non-spacesuit efficiency bonus is halved and won't work in space.
Increases lifesupport efficiency by +400% (additive). If installed in a non-spacesuit efficiency bonus is halved and won't work in space.
Increases lifesupport efficiency by +800% (additive). If installed in a non-spacesuit efficiency bonus is halved and won't work in space.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land[/color][/font]
Only functions on a moving spaceship, energy use is proportional to speed. Can gain data from interstellar movement, data generation is based on ship kinetic energy. The Nexus is a designed to act as a distortion drive and with the right technology can enable escape from the local stellar cluster.
Applies 2000 container integrity stress.
Length 3. Has a central junction with side connections. Good for moving fluids quickly through assembly lines.
Length 5. Has a central junction with side connections. Good for moving fluids quickly through assembly lines.
Length 7. Has a central junction with side connections. Good for moving fluids quickly through assembly lines.
Length 9. Does not connect on the sides. Good for parallel pipes and moving fluid over long distances quickly.
Length 15. Does not connect on the sides. Good for parallel pipes and moving fluid over long distances quickly.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Land, Spaceship[/color][/font]
A rocket silo for launching space probes.
A container linked by extradimensional space to other containers. The links of the container depend on the surface it is first placed on.

[font=default-bold][color=#f5cb48]Cannot be placed on: Spaceship[/color][/font]
Can take wires and trains between a planet or moon's surface and its orbit. See Space Elevators in [img=virtual-signal/informatron] Informatron for more information [Unknown control sequence: "informatron"]
Required for space elevator construction and maintenance.
Collects data from anywhere and returns [img=item/se-kr-remote-sensing-data] Remote sensing data. Must be launched from a space probe rocket silo.
